message:
Dear {{ recruiter_name or "Recruiter" }},

You have been assigned as a recruiter for the following job opening:

  • Position: {{ doc.designation }}
  • No. of Positions: {{ doc.custom_no_of_position }}
  • Job Opening ID: {{ doc.name }}
  • Company: {{ doc.company }}

Please proceed with the necessary recruitment actions, such as shortlisting candidates and coordinating interviews.

You can click here to access the job opening directly in the system.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact the HR department.

Best regards,
HR Team
name: Notify Job Opening Recruiters
subject: Job Opening Assigned - {{doc.name}}
